mapper.select: select * from classroom c join building b on c.building_code = b.building_code left outer join subj_time st on st.classroom_code = c.classroom_code left outer join open_subj o on o.open_sub_code = st.open_sub_code left outer join subject sj on sj.subj_code = o.subj_code left outer join timetable t on t.timetable_code = st.timetable_code order by c.classroom_code

select * from classroom c join building b on c.building_code = b.building_code left outer join subj_time st on st.classroom_code = c.classroom_code left outer join open_subj o on o.open_sub_code = st.open_sub_code left outer join subject sj on sj.subj_code = o.subj_code where c.usable = 'Y' order by c.classroom_code
